participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, enjoys sharing knowledge and helping others.
participant_1.background: I'm a librarian. I am 60 years old. I've visited Spain a few times. I think I'll retire in a few years.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Energetic and health-conscious, loves fitness and outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: I go to the gym regularly. I've short hair. I like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. Two dogs live with me.
